reviewText: This documentary from the History Channel tells the history of this famous ship, up to an including it's latest restoration in the 1990's. Besides hearing from naval historians who tell us about naval warfare from the late 18th century, it also shows us details of its construction which were a vital factor in its success. The presentation is well organized and ties all the information together. The information would be useful to any audience, from somebody just learning about ships to experts who want to see some of the construction features which just came to light from archival research.
